name: Trash Grab (Project Untitled)
description:
Trash Grab is Project Untitled's entry for the Wasted Resources 2 Game jam. 

Play as a Raccoon stealthing through someone's home to collect all of the rubbish laying around- One man's trash is another Raccoon's treasure!

Lots of what people throw away could be reused or recycled instead- here's where our Raccoon friends step in! The Raccoons use the useful things they collect from bins to create 'Trash tech', little devices which they can use to help them quickly and sneakily explore the building without being caught by anyone. Each trash tech works in different ways, from distracting and stalling the home dwellers to digging through walls to get outside more easily. Be careful that the Raccoon is not seen or heard, or it will be chased and if caught, animal control will be called putting you on a time limit. Escape with all of the rubbish you can before animal control arrive! 

All of the assets were made fresh for the game jam by ourselves- with the exception of the music. Art and animation was done by Nova and the programming by Deadpods.

We definitely left it way too late (apparently a day and a half isn't enough time to complete it- who knew), and are missing a lot of things we really wanted to include but we hope you can have some fun with it anyway. 

Things we know we need to include/ work on:

- AI animations

- Trash tech and animations 

- Outside decorations 

- UI (including title/win/loss screen) 

- Window bugged

- The people are terrifying

- A whole bunch of stuff

Music was sourced from https://soundimage.org/sample-page/
